MOV A, 1
MOV B, 0
MOV B, A
MOV C, [0x0666]
MOV A, [C]
INT
HALT

Hand-assembled, just for you:

0x0003 0x0B 0x03 0x0001 0x0001
0x0003 0x0B 0x03 0x0002 0x0000
0x0003 0x0B 0x0B 0x0002 0x0001
0x0003 0x0B 0x07 0x0003 0x0666
0x0003 0x0B 0x0F 0x0001 0x0003
0x0002 0x00 0x00 0x0000 0x0000
0x0001 0x00 0x00 0x0000 0x0000
